result.arabic_text: وَإِذۡ تَأَذَّنَ رَبُّكُمۡ لَئِن شَكَرۡتُمۡ لَأَزِيدَنَّكُمۡۖ وَلَئِن كَفَرۡتُمۡ إِنَّ عَذَابِي لَشَدِيدٞ
result.translation: Unibuke (yewe Muhamadi) ubwo Nyagasani wanyu yatangazaga (agira ati) “Nimuramuka mushimiye nzabongerera (ingabire zanjye), ariko nimuhakana, mumenye ko ibihano byanjye bihambaye.”
